Articles.Content:
You know... Hatbat and superhappysquid both have a similar sounding voice to macey dean, The same slightly humble and quiet sounding british voice

Maybe one of them is macey under a new profile.
As much as I enjoyed watching Macey Dean's videos, I think it's time to accept that he's most likely lost interest in KSP and has moved on.

Hello! I come from the future. I am here to say that Macey has come back once more. Now everyone shush and let this thread continue to slowly float down like a leaf in the wind, into the deep dark abyss where old threads go to sleep.
